help.deepDescription:
General help.
If no value is given, default help screen is shown.
If a value is given, more details about that task or attribute are shown.

interactive.description: Smartface Command-Line Interface in interactive mode
interactive.deepDescription: Smartface Command-Line Interface in interactive mode

outputRoot.description: Folder where the files will be put after a task is executed
outputRoot.deepDescription:
Publish processes produce Android apk files or iOS projects in a zip file.
	These files are placed under this root folder.

license.deepDescription: Your Smartface license file path. If none is given, 'Smartface Demo' license is used.

java.deepDescription:
Java 1.7 path
Android requires Java 1.7 decompilation, compilation, and signing of apk files.
If no input is given, program will try to guess the best possible option.

playerArm.description: Smartface Android Player apk for ARM architecture
playerArm.deepDescription: Smartface Android Player apk for ARM architecture

playerx86.description: Smartface Android Player apk for x86 architecture
playerx86.deepDescription: Smartface Android Player apk for x86 architecture

profile.description: Android options for architecture and package profiles
profile.deepDescription:
Android projects can be built for ARM or x86 architectures.
Profile options allow choosing different image folders such as Default, mdpi, hdpi, etc options.

maxJavaMemory.description: Maximum amount of memory to be consumed by Java
maxJavaMemory.deepDescription:
Maximum amount of memory to be consumed by Java.
Android publish processes may wish to consume RAM that may be greater than what is available in the host environment.
This is not an issue for most laptop or desktop environments, but more for Virtual Machines where RAM may be limited to 512 MB.

logLevel.deepDescription:
Log Level.
	Determines the verbosity level of logging.
	Log Levels: all, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, off

logFile.deepDescription:
Log to a specific file.
If this option is not given, logs are not written to a file.

logStdOut.deepDescription:
Log to console.
If this option is not given, logs are not printed on the console.
